Package Utility

Class TimeTraveller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utility.TimeTraveller
  • public class TimeTraveller
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles time conversion duties.

      • convertStringTimeDate2TimeStamp

        public static java.sql.Timestamp convertStringTimeDate2TimeStamp​(java.lang.String time,
                                                                 java.lang.String date)
        This method converts String values of time and date into properly formatted Timestamp date/time.
        Parameters:
        time - String value of time
        date - String value of date
        Returns:
        Returns Timestamp value date/time.

      • attachLocalTimeZone

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime attachLocalTimeZone​(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
        This method adds the system default time zone to a LocalDateTime variable.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - LocalDateTime variable to which the user would like specify as the system default timezone.
        Returns:
        Returns LocalDateTime value set to system default time zone.

      • attachESTTimeZone

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime attachESTTimeZone​(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
        This method adds Eastern Standard Time zone to the LocalDateTime arg.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - LocalDateTime in which the user would like to specify as EST.
        Returns:
        Returns LocalDateTime value set to EST.

      • convertESTToLocalTimeZone

        public static java.time.LocalDateTime convertESTToLocalTimeZone​(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
        This method accepts a LocalDateTime argument and converts the timezone it is associated with from EST to system default time zone.
        Parameters:
        dateTime - LocalDateTime in which the user would like to convert from EST to system default time zone.
        Returns:
        Returns LocalDateTime value set to system default time zone.

      • inBusinessHours

        public static boolean inBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime requestedStartLDT,
                                      java.time.LocalDateTime requestedEndLDT)
                               throws java.time.DateTimeException
        This method evaluates if the requested appointment start/end times are during business hours (8:00AM - 10:00PM EST).
        Parameters:
        requestedStartLDT - user requested appointment start time
        requestedEndLDT - user requested appointment end time
        Returns:
        Returns true if appointment start/end times are within business hours, false if not.
        Throws:
        java.time.DateTimeException - In the event of a DateTime error.

      • isOverlappingTimes

        public static int isOverlappingTimes​(boolean isNewAppointment,
                                     Customer customer,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime requestedStartLDT,
                                     java.time.LocalDateTime requestedEndLDT)
        This method evaluates if user requested appointment date/time will overlap any existing appointments.
        Parameters:
        isNewAppointment - true if this appointment is a new appointment to be added, false if modifying existing appointment
        customer - Customer in which appointment is being scheduled
        requestedStartLDT - user requested appointment start date/time
        requestedEndLDT - user requested appointment end date/time
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if overlap is found for user requested start date/time, returns 2 if overlap is found for user requested end date/time, returns 3 if an appointment is already scheduled between user requested start/end date/time, returns 4 if no overlap or no appointments are found for customer.
